node.excerpt: Dear Listener, We’re headed into 2022 so we look back on 2021 goals and talk about what we expect out of 2022. The goals are less specific this year, but here’s hoping for a joyful 2022. Thanks for listening and we’ll talk to you soon, Stan Lemon & Jon Kohlmeier

Dear Listener, Today we do a mid-year-ish check in on our goals for 2021 that we set back in Episode 115: Headed into a New Year. Overall we’re doing okay on our goals. Hopefully only to improve as the year continues. Stan Lemon & Jon Kohlmeier
